Package ca.yapper.yapperapp.Databases

Class NotificationsDatabase

java.lang.Object
ca.yapper.yapperapp.Databases.NotificationsDatabase
public class NotificationsDatabase extends Object
Class holding all the notification related functions that interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • saveToDatabase

      public static void saveToDatabase(Date dateTimeStamp, String userToId, String userFromId, String title, String message, String notificationType, boolean isRead, String eventId, String eventName)
      Function that saves the notification to Firestore under the "Notifications" collection. Sets the Firestore document ID for future reference.
      Parameters:
      dateTimeStamp - when the notification was made
      userToId - id of user getting the notification
      userFromId - id of user sending the notification
      title - title of notification
      message - contents of the notification
      notificationType - the type of notification
      isRead - the status of the notification(if it's been read or not)

    • loadNotifications

      public static void loadNotifications(String userDeviceId, NotificationsDatabase.OnNotificationsLoadedListener listener)
      Function that loads notifications that haven't been read, for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userDeviceId - The device ID of the user.
      listener - listener to handle outcome of loading a notification

    • markNotificationAsRead

      public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> markNotificationAsRead(String notificationId)
      Function that changes notifications from unread to read.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - id of a specific notification
      Returns:
      a Task with the result of the operation

    • sendNotificationToUser

      public static void sendNotificationToUser(String userId, Notification notification)
      This function sends a notification to a user by adding it in the database
      Parameters:
      userId - The id for the user, created from the device id.
      notification - a given notification

    • startNotificationListener

      public static void startNotificationListener(String deviceId, NotificationListener.NotificationCallback callback)
      This function initializes a listener checking for newly read notification
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The Id for users device.
      callback - handles the notifications we get

    • stopNotificationListener

      public static void stopNotificationListener()
      This function removes the notification listener

    • areNotificationsEnabled

      public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> areNotificationsEnabled(String deviceId)
      This function checks if a given users notifications are enabled
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the document exists and if notifications are enabled
